welcomeScreen.helpImprove: Help improve humanitarian responses from the comfort of your phone
welcomeScreen.withMissingMaps: With Missing Maps, we aim to put the world's vulnerable communities on the map
welcomeScreen.completeTasks: Complete tasks by swiping through satellite imagery of areas that need mapping
welcomeScreen.dataUse: The data is used to focus the efforts of Missing Maps volunteers to add detail to OpenStreetMap
welcomeScreen.mapHelps: The map helps organisations coordinate humanitarian efforts and save lives
